summary: A global communication app with voice chat, video chat, text chat, and community building features. Includes multi-language support, live lobby with language filters and topic tags, interactive voice rooms with listener-to-speaker transitions, translation and learning tools, and user profiles with language levels and interests.
architectural_notes: Real-time communication requires WebRTC or similar technology for voice/video chat
Multi-language support needs translation API integration (e.g., Google Translate, DeepL)
Live lobby requires real-time database synchronization for room status updates
AI transcription requires speech-to-text API integration
User authentication and profile management system needed
Moderation system required for report/block functionality
Profile system needs image upload and storage capability for user photos

existing_features.title: Create a Live Lobby discovery page with language filter tabs (Japanese, Bengali, English, and at least 5 additional languages) displayed at the top of the interface
Implement topic tags for all rooms with predefined categories including #Gaming, #Travel, #Skincare, and at least 10 additional diverse topics
Build a Hot Indicator algorithm that automatically moves rooms with the most active speakers to the top of the Live Lobby list, refreshing every 30 seconds
Create an Interactive Voice Room interface with distinct visual sections for Speakers and Listeners, where users join as Listeners by default
Implement Raise Hand functionality where Listeners can request to become Speakers, with a host approval system and visual notification queue
Add avatar pulsing visual indicator with a glowing ring animation that activates around the avatar of whoever is currently speaking in the voice room
Build an in-room text chat component positioned at the bottom of the voice room interface with scrolling message history
Implement instant message translation feature where users can tap any word in the chat to see its translation in their selected native language
Create user profile system with language level indicators showing Native or Learner status with specific proficiency levels (e.g., Japanese N5, Spanish B2)
Add interest tags to user profiles with predefined options including Resident Evil, Photography, and at least 20 diverse interests, used for room suggestions
Implement 2-tap Report and Block system with predefined report categories and immediate blocking effect
Build standard text chat functionality with direct messaging between users and group chat support
Create community building features including user-created public and private rooms with customizable settings
Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, welcoming colors (earth tones, soft pastels) and modern, rounded interface elements that promote global inclusivity and safe communication
Add profile picture upload functionality to the user profile, allowing users to upload and display a custom profile image
Add self-introduction text field to user profiles where users can write about themselves
Add likes and dislikes fields to user profiles as free-text input areas
Add hobbies field to user profiles as a free-text input area separate from the existing interest tags
Add favorite travel destinations field to user profiles where users can list places they want to visit
Add location field to user profiles where users can specify where they live
Add education field to user profiles where users can describe what they study or their educational background
Add occupation field to user profiles where users can specify their job or profession
Add age field to user profiles as a numeric input
Add gender field to user profiles as a dropdown or text input
Add relationship status field to user profiles as a dropdown selection
Update the UserProfile page to display all new profile fields in an organized layout with clear section headers
Update the ProfileSetup page to include form inputs for all new profile fields with appropriate validation
Add a persistent text chat interface overlay that remains visible and accessible during active voice calls in the VoiceRoom component
Ensure the InRoomChat component remains functional and accessible when users are actively engaged in voice communication (speaking or listening)
Create a video call interface component with integrated text chat overlay, allowing users to send and receive text messages during active video sessions
Update the VoiceRoom page to include a chat toggle button or permanent chat panel that allows users to view and interact with text messages while participating in voice conversations
